data.title: Angel Blue bio
data.text:
(Los Angeles, California)

2023–24 Season: Leonora, Il Trovatore

San Francisco Opera Highlights: Clara in Porgy and Bess

Recent and Upcoming: Micaëla in Carmen (Metropolitan Opera); Magda in La Rondine (Metropolitan Opera); title role of La Traviata (Metropolitan Opera); title role of Aida (London’s Royal Opera Covent Garden); concerts with the Metropolitan Opera Orchestra (on tour); title role of Porgy and Bess (Metropolitan Opera)

Grammy Award: Best Opera Recording for Porgy and Bess (2021) and Fire Shut Up in My Bones (2023)

Beverly Sills Award (2020)

Richard Tucker Award (2022)
